about.title: About Me
about.experience: With over 5 years of experience in AI development and data science, I have collaborated with startups and companies across diverse industries – from corporate culture and sustainability to media. My expertise spans from classical machine learning to cutting-edge agentic and generative AI solutions, always taking a holistic approach: from problem definition through development to deployment. My academic foundation includes degrees from Ludwig Maximilian University Munich, CEMS Global Alliance, ESADE Business School, and Tsinghua University.
about.motivation: My driving force is using cutting-edge technologies to solve real-world problems. With work experience in sustainability, I want to leverage my technical expertise to address the challenges of our modern world. For me, technology is a tool and enabler for humanity – it should serve progress and the common good.
